subcategories.name: information extraction
subcategories.description: Extract one or multiple user-specified categories of information from a piece of text attached in the user's query.
subcategories.structure: This is an information extraction task. Use a structured format to give the extracted information, such as a list or table.

subcategories.name: keywords extraction
subcategories.description: Extract the keywords from a piece of text.
subcategories.structure: This is a keywords extraction task. Use a list to give the keywords.

subcategories.name: table extraction
subcategories.description: Generate a table include the key information from a piece of text attached in the user's query.
subcategories.structure: First, analyse the question and give a brief analysis in the first paragraph. Then output the answer. Next, use a list to give explanations. Last, give a conclusion.
